function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//链接生成
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"http://app-cdn.jjwxc.net/bookstore/getFullPage?channelBody=%7B%"+url+"%22%3A%7B%22offset%22%3A%22{{(page-1)*25}}%22%2C%22limit%22%3A%2225%22%7D%7D&versionCode=148":url;

 try {tag = args[3];
 u=tag=="bq"?'https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=221&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq='+url+'&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=3&sd=0&lx=0&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token={\{cookie.getKey("https://m.jjwxc.net","sid")}\}':u;
 u=tag=="lx"?'https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=221&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq=0&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=3&sd=0&lx='+url+'&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token={\{cookie.getKey("https://m.jjwxc.net","sid")}}':u
 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))

":""; content=java.getString("$..content"); saybody=java.getString("$..sayBody"); say=saybody!=""?"\n作者有话说：\n"+saybody:""; if(baseUrl.match(/token/)){ vipc=String(content).length > 30?java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", String("KW8Dvm2N"), String("1ae2c94b")).decryptStr(content):java.getString("$..message")+"\n登录后请更新目录"; result=intro+String(vipc+say); }else{result=intro+content+say} }else{result="‎"} //评论开启 bbb = book.getVariable("custom") sss=source.getVariable() if(/评论/.test(bbb) || /评论/.test(sss)){ let commentNum =/评论/.test(bbb)?bbb.match(/评论(\d+)/)[1]:sss.match(/评论(\d+)/)[1]; if(/chapterContent/.test(baseUrl)){ commentUrl = baseUrl.replace(/androidapi/,'comment').replace(/chapterContent/,'getCommentList')+"&limit="+commentNum+"&offset=0"; }else if(/androidChapterBatchDownload/.test(baseUrl)) { body = baseUrl.match(/body":"(.*?)"/)[1]; commentUrl = "https://app.jjwxc.org/comment/getCommentList?"+body+"&limit="+commentNum+"&offset=0&commentSort=0" } comment = JSON.parse(java.ajax(commentUrl)); cflag = comment.code == "200" ? true:false; ccflag = comment.code == undefined ? true:false commentList = []; if(cflag || ccflag){ commentList =comment.commentList || comment.data.commentList ||[]; commentb = ""; }else{ commentb = comment.message } for(i=0;i ##为营造更好的评论环境，近期网站要求发评须进行实名认证，未实名用户评论暂时仅在对应作者后台及发评用户后台可见.*|获取正文失败[\s\S]+|◎\s+?◎

ruleToc.chapterName:
<js>
$=result;
title=$.chaptername;
title=String(title).replace(/^\s+/,'');
intro=$.chapterintro;
vip=$.isvip!='0';
lock=$.islock!='0';
type=$.chaptertype=='1'?true:false;
num=!type?$.chapterid+"  ☪ ":'';

bbb = book.getVariable("custom");
sss = source.getVariable();
if(/去章节序号/.test(bbb) || /去章节序号/.test(sss)){
num=''
}else{num=num}

title=type?'📖 '+title+' 📖':title;
if( (/目录简介/.test(bbb) || /目录简介/.test(sss))&&!/📖/.test(title)){
	title = title + " ❖ "+intro
	}else{
		title = title
		java.put("intro1",intro);
		}

l=lock?'[此章节已锁]':'';
result=num+title+l;
</js>

variableComment:
1、书籍变量（当前书）
填写 [去章节序号] —— 去除章节序号

填写 [目录简介] —— 章节简介放到目录列表，正文不出现

填写 [评论+评论数量]——如 评论50  则可以显示50条评论，数量必填

填写 [开启购买/关闭购买]  —— 如 开启购买 则会开启自动购买下五章【确认以后点右上角三点刷新才会生效，使用完毕后最好删除，避免重复请求】

2、源变量（所有书）
其余同书籍变量
填写[搜索+书名] —— 必须在第一行，搜索百合书籍，在发现里点击[百合搜索]

loginUrl:
<js>
var 电话号码=source.getLoginInfoMap().get("电话号码")||result.get("电话号码")

var 验证码=source.getLoginInfoMap().get( "验证码")

var time = Math.round(new Date()/1000);
lll=[
"appId=",
"osType=2",
"product=1",
"sysVer=10",
"time="+time,
"token=",
"ver=2.1.7",
"packageName=com.lestory.jihua.an",
"lang-app=zh-Hans",
"lang=zh-hans",
"locale=CN"
]
function toJson(list){
    json = "";
    for (i in list)
    {
        all = list[i].match(/(.*?)=(.*)/);
        key = all[1];
        value = all[2];
        json += '"' + key + '":' + '"' + value + '",'
    }
    json = '{' + String(json).replace(/,$/,'')+ '}'
    return json;
}

function sign(list){
var sb='';
sb+="Fb0gqLMSf5Android";
list=list.sort();
i=0;
while(i<list.length){
if(i==0){
sb+=list[i]
}else{
    if(list[i].match(/lang-app=/)){  
      i2=i+1;
     i3=i2+1;
     if (list[i2] != null && list[i2].match(/lang=/)) {
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i2];
                        
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i];
                        
                        i = i3;
                    }
           }
                sb+="&";
                sb+=list[i];             
      }
i++
}
sb+="AEdDtho2CjiH901aVK7swFqclu6NmzJ4";
return String(java.md5Encode(sb)).toUpperCase()
}

num=电话号码;
function getVerificationCode(){
	//获取验证码
 list2=lll;
list2.push( "mobile=86"+num);
s=sign(list2);
list2.push("sign="+s);
json2=toJson(list2);
option1={
"method": "POST",
"body": String(json2)
}
url='http://api.lestory.cn/message/send,'+JSON.stringify(option1);
java.toast(JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).msg=="success"?"验证码发送成功，请注意短信":"验证码获取失败，请稍候再试");

	}


function login(){
	//登录
	
	y=验证码
	list2=lll;
list2.push("mobile=86"+num);
list2.push("code="+y);
s=sign(list2);
list2.push("sign="+s);
json2=toJson(list2)

option1={
"method": "POST",
"body": String(json2)
}

url='http://api.lestory.cn/user/mobile-login,'+JSON.stringify(option1);
a=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url));
source.putLoginHeader(a.data.user_token=="undefined"?"":a.data.user_token)

java.toast(a.msg=="success"?'获取token成功':JSON.stringify(a));

}

</js>

var time = Math.round(new Date()/1000);
token=(source.getLoginHeader()!=""||source.getLoginHeader()!="undefined")?source.getLoginHeader():"34304776fc02d974a641eef13b603e20";
lll=[
"appId=",
"osType=2",
"product=1",
"sysVer=10",
"time="+time,
"token="+token,
"ver=2.1.7",
"packageName=com.lestory.jihua.an",
"lang-app=zh-Hans",
"lang=zh-hans",
"locale=CN"
]
function toJson(list){
    json = "";
    for (i in list)
    {
        all = list[i].match(/(.*?)=(.*)/);
        key = all[1];
        value = all[2];
        json += '"' + key + '":' + '"' + value + '",'
    }
    json = '{' + String(json).replace(/,$/,'')+ '}'
    return json;
}

function sign(list){
var sb='';
sb+="Fb0gqLMSf5Android";
list=list.sort();
i=0;
while(i<list.length){
if(i==0){
sb+=list[i]
}else{
    if(list[i].match(/lang-app=/)){  
      i2=i+1;
     i3=i2+1;
     if (list[i2] != null && list[i2].match(/lang=/)) {
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i2];
                        
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i];
                        
                        i = i3;
                    }
           }
                sb+="&";
                sb+=list[i];             
      }
i++
}
sb+="AEdDtho2CjiH901aVK7swFqclu6NmzJ4";
return String(java.md5Encode(sb)).toUpperCase()
}

li=lll;
li.push("page_num="+page);
li.push("keyword="+key);
s1=sign(li);
li.push("sign="+s1);
option={
"method": "POST",
"body": toJson(li)
}
url='http://api.lestory.cn/book/search,'+JSON.stringify(option)
</js>

『❗️太频繁可能IP不可用，所以最好不要离线缓存，正文出现乱码或空登录了并且隔十几分钟还是一直显示乱码正文，这时可以试试换个网络』

gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""

sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  function spArr(arr, num) {
    let newArr = []
    for (let i = 0; i < arr.length;) {
      newArr.push(arr.slice(i, i += num));
    }
    return newArr
  }
  function getTitle(x, name){
    if (variable){
      if (variable["volume"]["status"] == true && variable["volume"]["mode"] == 2){
        return x.volume_name + (variable["volume"]["spacer"] || " | ") + name;
      } else {
        return name;
      }
    } else {
      return name;
    }
  }
  let variable = source.getVariable();
  try {
    variable = JSON.parse(variable);
  } catch(err){
    variable = false;
  }
  
  let data = JSON.parse(result).data;
  let item_list = spArr(data["item_list"], 100)
  let array = [];
  
  for (let i = 0; i < item_list.length; i++){
    let response = java.ajax('https://api5-normal-lq.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/directory/all_infos/v/?item_ids=' + item_list[i] + '&iid=2718442795830583&aid=1967&version_code=290');

    let ChapterData = JSON.parse(response).data;
    ChapterData.forEach((x) => {
    	
      if(variable && variable["volume"]["status"] == true && variable["volume"]["mode"] == 1){
        if (JSON.stringify(array).indexOf(x.volume_name) == -1) {
          array.push({
            title: x.volume_name,
            isVolume: true
          });
        }
      }
      array.push({
        title: getTitle(x, x.title),
        url: 'https://novel.snssdk.com/api/novel/book/reader/full/v1/?group_id=' + x.group_id + '&item_id=' + x.item_id + '&aid=1977',
        item_id: x.item_id,
        group_id: x.group_id,
        first_pass_time: x.first_pass_time,
        updateTime: java.timeFormat(x.first_pass_time * 1000),
        isVolume: false
      })
    });
  }
  array
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
 loadDocType="{{@@body@data-doctype}}";
 loadType="{{@@body@data-randomtype}}";
sid=baseUrl.match(/(\d+).html/)[1];
url=baseUrl.replace(/\d+.html/,'')

var section = {
    loadDocType: loadDocType,
    loadType: loadType,
    sid:sid,
    content: {
        childNode: [],
        
        init: function(c){
            this.body=c
            if (section.loadType == 'normal') {
      this.load(String(java.base64Decode(java.getString('//*[@name="client"]/@content'))))
            } else if (section.loadType == 'substep') {
                var d = 'r' + section.sid;
                var f = false;
                if (section.loadDocType == 'xml') {
                    d += '.xml'
                } else if (section.loadDocType == 'json') {
                    d += '.json';
                    f = true
                } else {
                    return false
                };        
             cookie="PHPSESSID="+java.get(baseUrl,{}).cookie("PHPSESSID");
            token= java.get(url+d,{"X-Requested-With": "XMLHttpRequest","referer":baseUrl,"cookie":String(cookie)}).header("token")                
                	this.load(token)      	
            } else {
                return false
            };               
        },
        load: function(a) {         
            a = String(java.base64Decode(a)).split(/[A-Z]+%/);      
            var b = 0,
            start = 0;
            for (var i = 0; i < this.body.length; i++) {
                if (String(this.body[i]).match(/h2/i)) {
                    start = i + 1
                };
                if (String(this.body[i]).match(/div/i)&& this.body[i].attr("class") != 'chapter') {
                    break
                }
            };
          
            for (var i = 0; i < a.length; i++) {
                if (a[i] < 5) {
                    this.childNode[a[i]] = this.body[i + start];
                      b++
                } else {
                    this.childNode[a[i] - b] = this.body[i + start]                 
                }
            };
  }
}
}
section.content.init(java.getElement("@@id.content@children!0").toArray());
section.content.childNode.join("")
</js>

<js>
if(/"\/get-page-next\?"/.test(String(result))){
url = "https://www.damixs.co/get-page-next?"+Math.random();

post = result.match(/data: {'v1':'([^']+)','v2':'([^']+)','v3':'([^']+)','v4':'([^']+)'},/);

body ="v1="+java.encodeURI(post[1])+"&v2="+java.encodeURI(post[2])+"&v3="+java.encodeURI(post[3])+"&v4="+java.encodeURI(post[4]);

option = {
	"method":"POST",
	"body":body
	}
	j = java.ajax(url+","+JSON.stringify(option))

JSON.parse(j).url.replace(/\s+/g,'+')
}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
list=java.getElements("@@class.BGsectionThree-content@li").toArray();
intro=java.getElements('#intro').html();
href='';text='';
for(i in list){
href=href+list[i].select('a:eq(1)').attr('href')+'\n';
text=text+'【'+i+'】'+list[i].html()+'\n';
}
java.put('list',href);
xu=(book.getVariable("custom")==null||book.getVariable("custom")=="")?"0":book.getVariable("custom");
laiyuan='当前来源【'+xu+'】';
result='换源列表（点击设置书籍变量，输入序号，确认后刷新，可更改对应的源，默认为0）\n'+text+'\n'+laiyuan+'\n--------------\n'+intro
</js>
##更新 .*

content={ childNode:[], childNodes: result.match(/nrid="([^"]+)";/)?java.getElements("#"+result.match(/nrid="([^"]+)";/)[1]+"@p").toArray():"", UpWz:function(m, i) { var k = Math.ceil((i + 1) % this.code); k = Math.ceil(m - k); return k }, load:function(){ this.code=String(result).match(/codeurl="(\d+)"/)[1]; var e =String(java.base64Decode(java.getString('[name=client]@content'))).split(/[A-Z]+%/); for (var i = 0; i < e.length; i++) { var k = this.UpWz(e[i], i); this.childNode[k]=this.childNodes[i] }} } if(baseUrl.match(/verify/)){ result="如果没获取到目录，说明验证码不对，详情页刷新重新获取验证码" }else{if(baseUrl.match(/\d+_2\.html/)){ content.load(); result=content.childNode.join("
");}else if(baseUrl.match(/\/\d+\.html/)){ result=java.getElements("#articlecontent@p") }else{ eval(String(java.ajax(book.origin+"/17mb/js/cryptojs_min.js"))); function d(a, b) { b = CryptoJS.MD5(b).toString(); var d = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(b.substring(0, 16)); var e = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(b.substring(16)); return CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(a, e, { iv: d, padding: CryptoJS.pad.Pkcs7 }).toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8) } result=eval(result.match(/(d\("[\s\S]+"\))\)/)[1]); }}

ruleBookInfo.author: $.response.blogInfo.blogNickName||$.response.posts[0].post.blogInfo.blogNickName
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
try{
cookie = cookie.getCookie("https://newsmiss.lofter.com");

lofter = String(cookie).match(/;\s(LOFTER-[^-]+-LOGIN-AUTH)=(.*?);/);

header = {};
header[lofter[1]] = lofter[2];
source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(header))
result;
}catch(e){
	result = result
	}
</js>

ruleContent.content: content = java.getString("$..content"); imgs = eval(String(java.getString("$..photoLinks"))); video = "" if(/\.mp4/.test(baseUrl)){ video = "请点击章节链接观看视频\n视频链接："+baseUrl } img = ""; imgs?imgs.forEach(x=>{ x?img += "\n":"" }):"" result = content + "\n"+img + video;
ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
try{
		id = java.getString("$..post.id");
		id2 = java.getString("$..post.blogId");
url ="https://api.lofter.com/v1.1/trade/gift/post/newSupportInfo?postId="+id+"&blogId="+id2+"&openFansVipPlan=0&vipFans=0"
	$  = JSON.parse(String(java.ajax(url)));
	l = $.data.gainReturnGifts;
	ls = []
	l.forEach(x=>{
		url = "https://api.lofter.com/v1.1/trade/gift/myReturnGift?id="+x.id+"&postId="+id+"&blogId="+id2;
		ls.push(url)
		})
	result = ls
	}catch(e){
		}
</js>

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/500);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];

if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}

for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*500)))
}

list
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
if(result.match(/請勿瀏覽及購買本館商品，本網站已依照台灣網站內容分級規定處理。/)){
url="https://www.popo.tw{{@@id.books-form@action}}";

value=result.match(/name="_poporf-tk001" value="([^"]+)">/)[1];

Cookie=String(cookie.getCookie(baseUrl));
body='cid=&type=&_poporf-tk001='+value;

cookies=java.post(url,body,{"cookie":Cookie}).cookies();

Cookies=String(cookies).match(/\{(.*?)\}/)[1]+'; '+Cookie;

header={"Cookie":String(Cookies)}
headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}
java.put('header',JSON.stringify(headers));
Url=baseUrl+','+JSON.stringify(headers);

result=String(java.ajax(Url))

}else{result=result}
</js>

3.网不好时，或访问网站慢时，正文大概率为空
4.有新购买的章节记得更新目录后再看

bookSourceComment:
◎只看楼主：
在设置源变量（该源所有书应用）或者设置书籍变量（只有本书应用）里填上『只看楼主』则只会显示楼主内容
❗️注意：楼主如果是『匿名青花鱼』改规则会导致无正文内容，请删除设置变量里的《只看楼主》
做完更改后都需要刷新，正文如果缓存了也需要刷新，或者清除缓存

<js>
var n;
if
((result.match(/ \/ (\d+) 页/))!=null){
n=result.match(/ \/ (\d+) 页/)[1];
var list=[];
for(let i=1;i<=n;i++){
if(/page/.test(baseUrl)){
	list.push({k:'第'+i+'页',v:baseUrl.replace(/page(?:%3D|=)\d+/g,'&page='+i)});
	}else{
		list.push({k:'第'+i+'页',v:baseUrl+'&page='+i});
		}
}
}else{
var list=[{k:'第1页',v:baseUrl}];
}
list
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
paperid=baseUrl.match(/paperid=(\d+)/)[1];
code=result.match(/vercodechk.*?'[^']+'/)?result.match(/vercodechk.*?'([^']+)'/)[1]:'';
url=book.origin+'/showpapercolor.php,';
body='paperid='+paperid+'&vercodechk='+code;
option={
"method":"POST",
"body":String(body)
}
result=java.ajax(url+JSON.stringify(option));

eggs=java.getString('@@class.uk-placeholder.-1@html');
if(!eggs.match(/【作家想說的話：】|加載中.../) && eggs!=""){
eggs="【彩蛋内容：】"+eggs
}else{eggs=''}
write=java.getString('@@id.colorpanelwritersay@html');
result=result+write+eggs;
if(!String(result).match(/[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/) && !(String(result).match(/login\.php/))){
result="此章节需要购买\n💰"+java.getString('@@class.uk-card.0@class.uk-list.0@tag.li.10@text&&class.uk-alert-danger@html')
}else{result=result}
String(result).match(/login.php/)?'请登录后刷新正文阅读':result
</js>

loginUrl:
<js>
function login(){
userInfo=source.getLoginInfoMap()

UNE=userInfo['账号']
PWD=userInfo['密码']
url = "https://www.myrics.com/complete/email/";
body="email="+java.encodeURI(UNE)+"&password="+java.encodeURI(PWD);

c=java.post(url,body,{"referer":"https://www.myrics.com/login"});
x = c.cookies().csrftoken;
java.log(x)
c=String(c.cookies()).replace(/\{|\}/g,'').replace(/,/g,';')
Cookie={
	"cookie":String(c),
	"x-csrftoken":String(x)
	}
header = JSON.stringify(Cookie)
source.putLoginHeader(header)
}
</js>

doc=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result); chapter=doc.select(".chapter")?doc.select(".chapter"):''; chapter?chapter.remove():''; content = { star: 0, childNode: [], childNodes: doc.select("#content>div").toArray(), load: function() { var a = String(java.base64Decode(java.getString('//*[@name="client"]/@content'))).split(/[A-Z]+%/); var j = 0; for (var i = 0; i < a.length; i++) { if (a[i] < 3) { this.childNode[a[i]] = this.childNodes[i + this.star]; j++ } else { this.childNode[a[i] - j] = this.childNodes[i + this.star]; j=j+2 } }; } } content.load(); result=chapter+content.childNode.join("
"); String(result).replace(/([^<]+)<\/h3>/g,'◎ $1\n'); ####【注：$1】

<js>
if(baseUrl.match(/page/)){
result=""
}else{
allpage=result.match(/redtext'>(\d+)</)[1];
list=[];

len=allpage>10?10:allpage;

start=1;end=len;

if(book.getVariable("custom")){
start=book.getVariable("custom").match(/(\d+)-\d+/)[1];
end=book.getVariable("custom").match(/\d+-(\d+)/)[1];
}

for(i=start;i<=end;i++){
list.push(baseUrl+"&page="+i)
}
list
}
</js>

bookSourceComment:
◎只看楼主：
在设置源变量（该源所有书应用）或者设置书籍变量（只有本书应用）里填上『只看楼主』则只会显示楼主内容，有些页数内容为空很正常。
做完更改后都需要刷新，正文如果缓存了也需要刷新，或者清楚缓存
◎发现规则url
贴吧名::https://tieba.baidu.com/mo/q/m?word=贴吧名（不要写吧字）&page_from_search=index&tn6=bdISP&tn4=bdKSW&tn7=bdPSB&lm=16842752&lp=6093&sub4=%E8%BF%9B%E5%90%A7&pn={{(page-1)*30}}
◎可能访问频繁导致加载失败，点登录完成验证点✓，或者在无验证时直接点登录点✓，或者换个网络，再返回书籍刷新
需登录
loginUrl:
<js>
function getCode(type){
	try{
		phone = result.get("账号");
		
	url = "https://www.himehear.com/tjapp/v1/common/verifyCode";
	body={
		"messageType":1,
		"sendType":type,
		"account":String(phone)
		}
		
		option = {
			"method":"POST",
			"body":JSON.stringify(body)
			}
			
			url = url+","+JSON.stringify(option);
			
	  	JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).code==0?java.toast("验证码发送成功，请注意查收"):java.toast("验证码发送失败，请稍候再试");
	  	
			}catch(e){
				java.log(e)
				}
				
	}


function login(){
	phone = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("账号");
	code = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("验证码");
	url = "https://www.himehear.com/tjapp/v1/user/loginV2";
	
	if(/@/.test(String(phone))){
		loginType = 2
		}else if(/^\d{11}$/.test(String(phone))){
			loginType = 1
			}
	
	body = {
		"verifyCode":String(code),
		"loginType":2,
		"account":String(phone)
		}
		
	option = {
		"method":"POST",
		"body":JSON.stringify(body)
		}
		
	url = url + "," + JSON.stringify(option);
	
	token =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).result.token;
	java.log(token);
	
	headers = {
		"token":String(token)
		}
			source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(headers));
	
	}

</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
dramaPath = baseUrl.match(/.*\/(.*)/)[1];

function re(a){
	a = String(java.encodeURI(a)).replace(/\+/g,"%20").replace(/\*/g,'%2A').replace(/%7E/g,'~').replace(/%2F/g,'/');
	return a;
	}
	
oss = JSON.parse(java.get("https://www.himehear.com/tjapp/v1/oss/ali/sts",source.getLoginHeaderMap()).body()).result;

sk = oss.accessKeySecret;
ak = re(oss.accessKeyId);
st = oss.securityToken.trim();

date = String(parseInt(Date.now()/1000+3600));

data = "GET\n\n\n"+date+"\n"+"/tingjifm/"+dramaPath+"?security-token="+st;

sign = java.HMacBase64(data, "HMacSHA1", sk);

url = `https://tingjifm.oss-cn-shenzhen.aliyuncs.com/${dramaPath}?Expires=${date}&OSSAccessKeyId=${ak}&Signature=${sign}&security-token=${re(st)}`;
</js>

ruleSearch.author: $.username||$.author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
key=java.get('key');
page=java.get('page');

//创建两个空数组
json=[];json2=[];

//判定json里是否有列表
if(JSON.parse(result).info.Datas){
json=JSON.parse(result).info.Datas;}

//加载单曲搜索页面并转为json
json1=JSON.parse(java.ajax('https://www.missevan.com/sound/getsearch?s='+key+'&type=3&page_size=10&p='+page));

//判定json里是否有列表
if(json1.info.Datas){
json2=json1.info.Datas
}

//剧集搜索列表与单曲搜索列表拼接
list=json.concat(json2);

result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>
$.[*]
